remarks: A set of vectors is closed iff it equals its double orthocomplent. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dochoccl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochoccl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochoccl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochoccl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochoccl.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochoccl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochoccl.g $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
dochoccl $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. ran I <-> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = X ) ) $.
